about.p1: I'm programmer, specialising in Front-end development. I'm living and studing in Minsk now. And I desire to have a good job :)
about.p2: I'm fond of finding resolve of some interesting tasks, creating a visual part of application, working with interfaces and self-developing. So, in the future, when I get a big experience in Front-end direction, I wish to learn adjacent vectors of web delelopment.
about.p3: I've got about 1 year of work experience in Innowise Group, where I've been working on several Pet-projects and one internal project.
about.p4: Outside of work, I like cooking some intersting dishes (cheesecakes for example). Also I'm studying in Faculty of Applied Mathematic and Computer Science, where I'm managing a science direction.
